
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int min(int a,int b)
{
    return (a<b?a:b);
}
int main()
{
    int t,a,b,c,A,B,C,N;
    long long count;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              count = 0;
              scanf("%d%d%d%d",&N,&A,&B,&C);
              for(a=0;a<=A && a<=N;a++)
                for(b=0;b<=B && b <= N-a;b++)
                   {
                        count += (min(C,N-a-b) + 1);
                   }
              printf("%lld\n",count);
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
